Hero keeper is a real time strategy game centered around constructing a kingdom that will attract heroes to fight other rival kingdoms and monsters that appose you. Attract adventurers to your kingdom and provide them with the means of tackling your enemies. You have no direct control over what adventurers do in your kingdom; adventurers will explore, fight monsters and rival kingdoms, level up and distribute stat points, learn new spells and make use of the services such as shops that your kingdom provides them.

-Features

  1.  Two Races to play as!
  2.  Campaign and Skirmish modes
  3.  Voice acting for the campaign and heroes alike!
  4.  Handle different kinds of heroes from knights and Archers to wizards and beast handlers!
  5.  Build a kingdom to attract heroes and destroy your rivals!
  6.  Many different monster types with unique abilities for you and your heroes to fight against.
  7.  Fight other kingdoms with rival heroes and abilities.
  8.  Fight in many different environments with actively changing weather.
  9.  Heroes are smart and will explore, fight, level up and shop for items on their own, taking direction from you in the form of quests.
  10.  Heroes have different personality's for instance thief's will steal gold from your's and your opponents shops and loot monster dens
  11.  Skirmish mode allows you play on randomly generated maps against AI opponents or just fight monsters.

The Android APK is now fully up to date with the current game and will continue to be updated alongside the windows version.
